long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Cloud PBX Chrome extension allows you to click-to-call, receive CRM screen pops, and more right from your web-browser. With 60+ pre-built integrations, and more being added regularly, you can count on our application to improve workflows and streamline processes. Simply sign-in with your existing Cloud PBX login and you will be up and running in seconds.
